ðŸ“– Summary: Appwrite is a developer-first, open-source backend-as-a-service platform that simplifies building scalable web, mobile, and backend applications. It provides a suite of microservices packaged as Docker containers, offering features like authentication, databases, storage, and cloud functions, along with an integrated hosting solution.
